casebody.data:
Harrah's Ohio Acquisition Co., L.L.C.
v.
Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision 2016-0568 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On second unopposed motion of Harrah's Ohio Acquisition Company, L.L.C, to reschedule June 19, 2018 oral argument before a master commissioner. Motion denied as duplicative.
